input.message:
For the rail coating training in Bergamo, the most skilled employee in **skill_rail** is **Christoph Adler** with an exceptional skill level of **10** (the maximum possible).

He is currently based at the Munich Office in Germany and works in the Sales & Customer Success department. With his top-tier expertise in rail coatings, he would be the ideal person to send to Bergamo to conduct the training.
